member.name: T:Microsoft.Protocols.TestTools.ExtendedLogging.ExtendedLogger
member.summary: Provides APIs for logging in Protocol Library and dumping message to ETW provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestTools.ExtendedLogging.ExtendedLogger.DumpMessage(System.String,Microsoft.Protocols.TestTools.ExtendedLogging.DumpLevel,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Dumps network message to ETW provider.
member.param: The Name of the Message. In format protocol:message
An enum indicating whether this message is a complete message on the wire or only part of the encrypted structure.
Some comments about the dumped message.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestTools.ExtendedLogging.ExtendedLogger.DumpMessage(System.String,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Dumps network message to ETW provider.
member.param: The Name of the Message. In format protocol:message

member.summary: Dumps network message to ETW provider.
member.param: The Name of the Message. In format protocol:message

member.name: T:Microsoft.Protocols.TestTools.ExtendedLogging.DumpLevel
member.summary: Dump level for the DumpMessage method

member.name: F:Microsoft.Protocols.TestTools.ExtendedLogging.DumpLevel.WholeMessage
member.summary: The message is a message on the wire.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Protocols.TestTools.ExtendedLogging.DumpLevel.PartialMessage
member.summary: The message is part of the message on the wire.
